channel.title: ::yell problems
channel.description: Can anyone redirect me/show me how to add a ::yell command? The new source my friends using doesnt have one. Im SUPER new to coding. Started yesterday, but Im reading alot of TuTs and Im getting the hang of it. (Hey, we all have to start somewhere, right?) And I tried to find one.. But I had no results. Any help please?

item.title: ::yell problems
item.dc:creator: @lolcracker lolcracker
item.description:
@lolcracker wrote:

Thanks. Ill try it now.

item.title: ::yell problems
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }

try this one.

add it to command list.
